title-group.article-title: Numerical Aspects in Estimating the Parameters of a Mixture of Normal Distributions

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1992 American Statistical Association, Institute of Mathematical Statistics, and Interface Foundation of North America

abstract.p: Mixtures of normal distributions arise naturally in robustness analyses when distributional assumptions are not met and with the analysis of contaminated data. Typically these analyses involve substantial computational problems. We present some simulation procedures that address these difficulties.
